tp:struct.name: Alias_Pair
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A pair (contact handle, alias) as seen in the AliasesChanged signal on the Aliasing interface.

tp:struct.name: Capability_Pair
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A pair (channel type, type-specific flags) as passed to AdvertiseCapabilities on the Capabilities interface.

tp:struct.name: Contact_Capability
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (contact handle, channel type, generic flags, type-specific flags) representing a capability posessed by a contact, as returned by GetCapabilities on the Capabilities interface.

tp:struct.name: Capability_Change
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (contact handle, channel type, old generic flags, new generic flags, old type-specific flags, new type-specific flags) representing a change to one of a contact's capabilities, as seen in the CapabilitiesChanged signal on the Capabilities interface.

tp:struct.name: Param_Spec
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (parameter name, flags, signature, default value) representing an allowed parameter, as returned by GetParameters on the ConnectionManager interface.

tp:struct.name: Channel_List_Entry
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (channel path, channel type, handle type, handle) representing a channel, as returned by ListChannels on the Connection interface.

tp:struct.name: Local_Pending_Info
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (handle to be added, handle of contact requesting the change, reason code, optional message) representing a contact whose attempt to join a group is to be confirmed by the local user, as returned by GetLocalPendingMembersWithInfo on the Group interface.

tp:struct.name: Pending_Text_Message
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (message ID, timestamp in seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00 UTC, sender's handle, message type, flags, text) representing a pending text message, as returned by ListPendingMessages on the Text channel type. The arguments of the Received signal also match this struct's signature.

tp:struct.name: Property_Spec
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, property name, D-Bus signature, flags) representing a property, as returned by ListProperties on the Properties interface.

tp:struct.name: Property_Flags_Change
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, flags) representing a change to a property's flags, as seen in the PropertyFlagsChanged signal on the Properties interface.

tp:struct.name: Property_Value
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, value) representing a property's value, as seen in the PropertiesChanged signal on the Properties interface, returned by the GetProperties method and passed to the SetProperties method.

tp:struct.name: Tube_List_Entry
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (tube ID, initiator handle, tube type, service name, parameters, state) representing a tube, as returned by ListTubes on the Tubes channel type.

tp:struct.name: DBus_Tube_Member
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (handle, unique name) representing a participant in a D-Bus tube, as returned by GetDBusNames on the Tubes channel type, and as seen in the DBusNamesChanged signal.

tp:mapping.name: String_Variant_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: A mapping from strings to variants representing extra key-value pairs.

tp:mapping.name: String_String_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: A mapping from strings to strings representing extra key-value pairs.

tp:mapping.name: Multiple_Status_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: Mapping used in Last_Activity_And_Statuses and passed to SetStatus, representing a collection of statuses. Use of this mapping with more than one member is deprecated.

tp:struct.name: Last_Activity_And_Statuses
tp:struct.tp:docstring: Structure representing a contact's presence, containing a last-activity time (deprecated) and a Multiple_Status_Map.

tp:mapping.name: Contact_Presences
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: Mapping returned by GetPresence and signalled by PresenceUpdate, where the keys are contacts and the values represent their presences.
